name: Light In Room
description:
Try to find the light in the room and reach the very end.

Play on your phone without internet connection.

___

DIVE IN THE VIRTUAL WORLD:

■ Go only forward

■ Find the light in the dark

■ Full localization into Russian

■ Version specially for Android and touch screens

■ The game has been redesigned for Android touch screen controls.

■ Autosave will help you continue the game exactly where you left off (even if you close the application!)

■ No in-app purchases
